StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetO.cerDropView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @OSS int = NULL, @SortExpression nvarchar(100) = 'PersonName' AS
SELECT P.PERSON_ID, N.NWA_ID, C.CONTRACT_ID, dbo.OCS.OCS_ID, P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME + COALESCE(SPACE(1) + P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS PERSON_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER AS SSN, DIST.SHORT_NAME AS DISTRICT, MC.GENDER_CODE AS GENDER, OC.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE AS TRAINING_TYPE, OC.CLASS_NUMBER AS CLASS_INCREMENT, dbo.OCS.CLASS_RESULT_DATE AS RESULT_DATE, dbo.OCS.REPORT_DATE, COALESCE(OCR.RESULT_DESCRIPTION, SPACE(0)) AS TRAINING_RESULT, OCS.DROP_REASON AS DROP_CODE, ODR.DROP_REASON_DESCRIPTION AS DROP_REASON, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), OCS.TRAINING_DROP_WEEK), SPACE(0)) AS TRAINING_DROP_WEEK, SD.STATUS_DESCRIPTION, SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, RO.ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.SHORT_NAME AS ORGANIZATION_NAME, RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] DIST WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] RS_M ON (DIST.ORGANIZATION_ID = RS_M.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID) INNER JOIN [dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OSS_M ON (RS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = OSS_M.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AND OSS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = OSS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID) INNER JOIN [dbo].[NWA] N ON (N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = OSS_M.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @OSS) INNER JOIN [dbo].[OCS] ON (N.NWA_ID = dbo.OCS.NWA_ID) INNER JOIN [dbo].[OCS_CLASS] OC ON (dbo.OCS.OCS_ID = USMC.GetMaxOCSID(dbo.OCS.NWA_ID, 'Y') AND dbo.OCS.OCS_CLASS_ID = OC.CLASS_ID AND OC.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE != 'OCC' AND dbo.OCS.SCHEDULED_SHIP_DATE BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) INNER JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] P ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[MARINE_CANDIDATE] MC ON P.PERSON_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] RO ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] CS ON (N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'O' AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = USMC.GetMaxStatusID(CS.NWA_ID)) INNER JOIN [dbo].[STATUS_DISPOSITION] SD ON (CS.STATUS_TYPE = SD.STATUS_TYPE AND CS.STATUS_CODE = SD.STATUS_CODE AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = SD.DISPOSITION_CODE AND SD.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('AQ','AR','BD','BC')) LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[OFFICER_CONTRACT] C ON dbo.OCS.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[OCS_DROP_REASON] ODR ON dbo.OCS.DROP_REASON = ODR.DROP_REASON_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[OCS_CLASS_RESULT] OCR ON dbo.OCS.CLASS_RESULT_CODE = OCR.RESULT_CODE ORDER BY CASE WHEN @SortExpression='PersonName' THEN P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='PersonName DESC' THEN P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='TrainingType' THEN OC.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='TrainingType DESC' THEN OC.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='ClassIncrement' THEN OC.CLASS_NUMBER END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='ClassIncrement DESC' THEN OC.CLASS_NUMBER END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='ResultDate' THEN dbo.OCS.CLASS_RESULT_DATE END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='ResultDate DESC' THEN dbo.OCS.CLASS_RESULT_DATE END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='TrainingResult' THEN OCR.RESULT_DESCRIPTION END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='TrainingResult DESC' THEN OCR.RESULT_DESCRIPTION END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='District' THEN DIST.SHORT_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='District DESC' THEN DIST.SHORT_NAME END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='OrgName' THEN RO.SHORT_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='OrgName DESC' THEN RO.SHORT_NAME END DESC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='Disposi.on' THEN SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION END ASC, CASE WHEN @SortExpression='Disposi.on DESC' THEN SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION END DESC
